channel.title: Verifying Email Problem
channel.description: For my other account, I keep trying to verify email for it by sending emails and changing the email to the right one to make sure I'm not sending to wrong one, but no emails yet? It's been about an hour. And yes I've checked spam. Any help greatly appreciated.

item.title: Verifying Email Problem

item.description:

Have you try it again?

Or mabye probley you already registered an acc with that email…
